source_description: Build an iOS and Android application for sobriety support that enables authentic peer accountability through curated sponsor/sponsee matching. Features include: mutual sobriety tracking with full transparency, algorithm-based matching using comprehensive criteria (recovery profile, preferences, demographics, values), structured 12-step AA worksheets that sponsors can edit, hybrid communication (in-app messaging + optional contact sharing) with structured check-ins, sponsor capacity management with request accept/deny/message capabilities, complete progress visibility for sponsors, and full dark/light mode support.
